language.ACTION_VIRTUAL_KEYBOARD_MESSAGE: Virtual Keyboard activated and will automatically pop-up when entering a form field
language.QUICK_BUTTON_KEYBOARD_NAVIGATION_MESSAGE: Keyboard navigation activated. You can now use Tab and the following letter shortcuts, to navigate the website: H = jump between titles G = jump between images B = jump between buttons K = jump between links F= jump between form elements L= jump between lists I = jump between list and menu items T = jump between tables
language.VALIDATION_TELEPHONE: Please enter a valid, digit only number
language.QUICK_BUTTON_ACCESS_MODE_MESSAGE: Accessibility mode has been turned on and you can now use the website with your keyboard or with a screen reading software.
language.SCREEN_READERS_GREETING_BACKUP: We have noticed that you didn't turn accessibility on. To turn on screen reader adjustments, click Alt+1.
language.SCREEN_READERS_GREETING: To use the website in screen-reader mode - click Alt+1.
language.SCREEN_READERS_GREETING_MOBILE: To use the website in screen-reader mode - click the first button of the site
language.ACCESS_MODE_ACTIVATED: Accessibility adjustments are saved. To open the accessible navigation menu, press Alt+1 at any time.
language.CALENDAR_TRIGGER: Press ↓ to Enter - Tab to Skip
language.PROFILES_TITLE: Choose the right accessibility profile for you
language.PROFILE_BLIND_TEXT: Use the website with your screen-reader
language.PROFILE_BLIND_MESSAGE:
This profile adjusts the website to be compatible with screen-readers such as JAWS, NVDA, VoiceOver, and TalkBack. A screen-reader is software that is installed on the blind user’s computer and smartphone, and websites should ensure compatibility with it.

Note: This profile prompts automatically to screen-readers.
language.PROFILE_MOTOR_TEXT: Use the website with the keyboard
language.PROFILE_MOTOR_MESSAGE:
This profile enables motor-impaired persons to operate the website using the keyboard Tab, Shift+Tab, and the Enter keys. Users can also use shortcuts such as “M” (menus), “H” (headings), “F” (forms), “B” (buttons), and “G” (graphics) to jump to specific elements.

Note: This profile prompts automatically for keyboard users.
language.PROFILE_VISION_MESSAGE: This profile adjusts the website, so that it is accessible to the majority of visual impairments such as Degrading Eyesight, Tunnel Vision, Cataract, Glaucoma, and others.
language.PROFILE_COGNITIVE_MESSAGE: This profile provides various assistive features to help users with cognitive disabilities such as Autism, Dyslexia, CVA, and others, to focus on the essential elements of the website more easily.
language.PROFILE_EPILEPSY_MESSAGE: This profile enables people with epilepsy to use the website safely by eliminating the risk of seizures that result from flashing or blinking animations and risky color combinations.
language.PROFILE_ADHD_MESSAGE: This profile significantly reduces distractions, to help people with ADHD and Neurodevelopmental disorders browse, read, and focus on the essential elements of the website more easily.
language.MOUSE_EVENT_DROPDOWN_INSTRUCTIONS: ↓ to enter dropdown, ESC to return
language.ACTION_MAGNIFIER_MESSAGE: When hovering texts with the mouse, you'll get a bigger and separated window with the texts showing
language.ACTION_LETTER_NAVIGATION_MESSAGE: You can now navigate using the following letters and holding the Ctrl key: T = jump between tables, G = jump between images, L = just between lists, I = just between list and menu items, K = jump between links, B = jump between buttons, F = jump between form elements, H = jump between titles.
language.FEEDBACK_TITLE: Have a disability? we'd love for your feedback regarding the accessibility level of the site!
language.HELP_TITLE: Need Help? Here Are Some FAQ
language.ENABLE_KEYBOARD_NAVIGATION: Activate Keyboard Navigation Using TAB, Letter Keys and Arrow Keys
language.ENABLE_VIRTUAL_KEYBOARD: Activate a Virtual Keyboard While Typing
language.FEEDBACK_FORM_AGREEMENT: This is a feedback form for people with disabilities. Any submission that is not related to accessibility will be ignored. Accept by checking the box.
language.OPEN_WIDGET: Open the Accessibility Interface (Can also be opened using the Alt+9 Key)
language.BACKUP_FORM_ACSB_AGREEMENT: I agree to allow the website's accessibility managers to receive this message and take care of it
language.BACKUP_FORM_EXPLANATION: This form is accessible to blind people. Still, if you've encountered an issue or malfunction, click Alt+4 for an accessible alternative form.
language.BACKUP_FORM_TITLE: This form will be sent to the website's accessibility supervisor and admins for a quick resolution.
language.POPUP_HIDE_TEXT: Please note: If you choose to hide the accessibility interface, you won't be able to see it anymore, unless you clear your browsing history and data. Are you sure that you wish to hide the interface?
language.FORM_GENERAL_ERROR: General error occurred, please refresh and try again
language.FORM_FIELD_EMPTY: Please fill all the form fields
language.FORM_FIELD_EMAIL: The provided email address is invalid
language.FEEDBACK_EMAIL_SUBJECT: A User Left Feedback On the accessiBe Accessibility Interface
language.FEEDBACK_FORM_TITLE: Your Message Has Been Successfully Sent!
language.NAVIGATOR_ARIA_LABEL: Accessible navigation between pages and areas - click enter to activate and TAB to browse options
language.NAVIGATOR_TRIGGER_SR_EXPLANATION: Accessible Navigation: quickly access important pages or skip to sections within the page.
language.KEYNAV_ACTIVATION_PROMPT: It looks like you are attempting to use the website with the keyboard, do you want to turn on keyboard navigation accessibility?
language.NAVIGATOR_EXPLANATION: ↑↓ to navigate. Esc to close. Tab to skip.
language.ACTIVE_POPUP: Popup panel. Press ESCAPE to close, navigate with TAB.
language.IFRAME_WARNING: This is an Iframe provided by a 3rd-party and is out of our control, so it may not be accessible.
language.FRONT_TRACKING_IFRAME: This element is for data analysis purposes and not to be used
language.FRONT_PDF_LINK: This link will open a PDF document that may not be accessible
language.PROCESSING_DATA_PLEASE_WAIT: Processing the data, please give it a few seconds...
language.FRONT_PROCESSING_ALT: Processing and scanning the picture, please wait a few seconds for an accurate description...
language.KEYNAV_TRIGGER_ACCESSIBLE_MODE: Use Website in Keyboard Navigation & Screen-Reader Mode
language.KEYNAV_TRIGGER_ACCESSIBLE_MODE_MOBILE: Use Website In a Screen-Reader Mode
